data.name: DescriptionAddWallpaper
data.value: Select a file or specify a website url to set as a wallpaper.

data.name: DescriptionAppRules
data.value: Wallpaper playback behaviour based on running application.

data.name: DescriptionCancelQuestion
data.value: Are you sure you want to cancel?

data.name: DescriptionDeleteConfirmation
data.value: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the wallpaper from the disk?

data.name: DescriptionDragDropFIle
data.value: Simply drag and drop files into Library.

data.name: DescriptionExternalAppWarning
data.value: You are opening an external application as wallpaper. Malicious applications can host malware, virus.. and do harm to your system. Only continue if this application comes from a trusted source.

data.name: DescriptionMinimizedTray
data.value: Lively is minimized to systemtray, right click lively icon to continue.

data.name: DescriptionPleaseRestartLively
data.value: Please restart Lively for settings to take effect.

data.name: DescriptionRestoringWallpaper
data.value: Currently restoring previous wallpaper(s), please wait...

data.name: DescriptionUpdateAvailable
data.value: A new version of software is available!

data.name: DescriptionWebpageLoad
data.value: Enter website link to load, shadertoy.com shader links are supported

data.name: DescriptionWelcomeWizard
data.value: This wizard will get you started on setting up Lively.

data.name: LivelyExceptionAppUpdateFail
data.value: Failed to update; try downloading the installer from: https://github.com/rocksdanister/lively/releases

data.name: LivelyExceptionGeneral
data.value: Oops... Looks like something wen't wrong :( In order to better understand this error and fix the issue, share the log file with the developer. Instructions for sharing log file: https://github.com/rocksdanister/lively/wiki

data.name: LivelyExceptionHighContrastMode
data.value: Lively cannot work properly with Windows High Contrast mode enabled! Disable High Contrast mode and try again.

data.name: LivelyExceptionMediaPlayback
data.value:
Media playback failed :( Try changing the videoplayer in lively settings.
In order to better understand this error and fix the issue, share the log file with the developer. Instructions for sharing log file: https://github.com/rocksdanister/lively/wiki

data.name: LivelyExceptionSafeModeStart
data.value: Lively was not closed properly, starting in safe mode. Do you wish to restore previously running wallpapers?

data.name: LivelyExceptionWorkerWSetupFail
data.value:
It looks like some settings needs to be set to make Lively work:- 1. Open This PC(My Computer) 2. Right-click empty area 3. Select Properties 4. Select Advanced System Settings 5. Under Performance tab select Settings 6. Enable Animate controls and elements inside windows and Apply.
If Windows 7 just set - Adjust for best appearance & Apply. If still not working, close & start Lively again/ restart windows. (Does not work in some insider windows 10 builds)

data.name: TextupdateCheckFail
data.value: Failed to check for software update

data.name: TipAddWallpaperFileBrowse
data.value: Set all supported file types as wallpaper.

data.name: TipAddWallpaperURL
data.value: Set the web page of the URL you entered as wallpaper.

data.name: TipAppFocus
data.value: Set what to do when any application is in focus.

data.name: TipAppFullScreen
data.value: Set what to do when fullscreen games/applications are running.

data.name: TipAppRules
data.value: Set different wallpaper playback rules based on running application.

data.name: TipAppTheme
data.value: Lively adapts to system theme settings, to change appearance goto

data.name: TipBatteryPower
data.value: (For battery operated systems only) Change playback when AC power is disconnected.

data.name: TipBrowserDebuggingPort
data.value: Enter the port for debugging webpage wallpapers, browser restart is required for changes to take effect. When ready navigate to http://localhost:portnumber to access developer console.

data.name: TipDisplayPauseRule
data.value: Per: Pause wallpaper only on the screen in which application is focused/fullscreen. All: Pause wallpaper on all screen(s) if any application is focused/fullscreen.

data.name: TipHideSysTray
data.value: System-tray icon visibility, lively will continue to run with the icon hidden.

data.name: TipLanguage
data.value: Lively will restart to apply the new language.

data.name: TipPauseAlgorithm
data.value: Foreground: Lightweight, only checks the single process that is in foreground to determine wallpaper playback behaviour. All Process: Heavier, Scans all the process to determine playback behaviour.

data.name: TipStreamWallpaperDetect
data.value: If supported video stream link is detected use the video player instead of loading the webpage.

data.name: TipStreamWallpaperVideoQuality
data.value: Select the desired video quality for online streams.

data.name: TipTileSize
data.value: Size of the wallpaper tiles in Library.

data.name: TipUIMode
data.value: For low-end systems select Lite mode.

data.name: TipVideoPlayer
data.value: Select the player used for video wallpaper. libVLC is recommended.

data.name: TipWallpaperDir
data.value: Path used to store wallpaper files.

data.name: TipWallpaperInput
data.value: Select ways to interact with wallpaper.

data.name: TipWallpaperLayout
data.value: How wallpaper is applied to connected display devices.

data.name: TipWallpaperPlayback
data.value: Pause wallpaper playback when desktop is not focused.

data.name: TipWebBrowserDiskCache
data.value: Store temporary files on disk instead of memory, settings gets restored when browser is restarted.

data.name: TipWebBrowserEngine
data.value: CEF(Chromium Embedded Framework) is a lightweight chromium engine. Edge is the built in webview of windows 10.

data.name: TipWindowsStartup
data.value: Lively needs to run in the background for wallpaper playback.

data.name: TitleBrowseFile
data.value: Browse for video, gif, webpage... file to set as wallpaper

data.name: TitleWallpaperDirMoveExisting
data.value: Move existing wallpapers to new folder
